      • createSystemIndexes

        public ArrayList<org.h2.index.Index> createSystemIndexes(GridH2Table tbl)
        Create list of indexes. First must be primary key, after that all unique indexes and only then non-unique indexes. All indexes must be subtypes of H2TreeIndex.
        Specified by:
        createSystemIndexes in interface GridH2SystemIndexFactory
        Parameters:
        tbl - Table to create indexes for.
        Returns:
        List of indexes.
